snippet: Captaintreacherous, the pacer of the year in 2012, will try to keep his undefeated season rolling when he takes on nine rivals in the $635,750 Meadowlands Pace.
abstract: Captaintreacherous, harness racing's pacer of the year in 2012, will try to keep his undefeated season rolling when the colt takes on nine rivals in $635,750 Meadowlands Pace.
lead_paragraph: Captaintreacherous, the pacer of the year in 2012, will try to keep his undefeated season rolling when he takes on nine rivals in the $635,750 Meadowlands Pace.

headline.main: Unbeaten Colt Captaintreacherous Is Favorite in Meadowlands Pace
